comment_text: I have been there too! Everything on the menu is awesome!
I know the owner, Bob! He is a great guy. Sorry you had a bad experience
I went once and said never again - the cashier was collecting food AND cooking without gloves
I am shocked you were in and out so quick. I go in the morning and it takes forever
Thanks for the heads up! They are close to my house, but I never got the courage to try their food out
